data.meta_description: Aralaguppe village is located in Chikmagalur Taluka of Chikmagalur district in Karnataka, India. Get Detailed information about Aralaguppe village like History, Population, Census, Pincode, STD Code, Street Map, Satellite Map etc.
data.text:
Aralaguppe

Block / Taluka → Chikmagalur

District → Chikmagalur

State → Karnataka

About Aralaguppe

According to Census 2011 information the location code or village code of Aralaguppe village is 609729. Aralaguppe village is located in Chikmagalur taluka of Chikmagalur district in Karnataka, India. It is situated 6km away from Chikmagalur, which is both district & sub-district headquarter of Aralaguppe village. As per 2009 stats, Allampura is the gram panchayat of Aralaguppe village.

The total geographical area of village is 1184.18 hectares. Aralaguppe has a total population of 2,538 peoples, out of which male population is 1,253 while female population is 1,285. Literacy rate of aralaguppe village is 72.14% out of which 77.89% males and 66.54% females are literate. There are about 610 houses in aralaguppe village. Pincode of aralaguppe village locality is 577131.

When it comes to administration, Aralaguppe village is administrated by a sarpanch who is elected representative of the village by the local elections. As per 2019 stats, Aralaguppe village comes under Chikkamagaluru assembly constituency & Udupi Chikkamagaluru parliamentary constituency. Chikmagalur is nearest town to aralaguppe for all major economic activities, which is approximately 6km away.
